title: "Dubai-based start-up targets ship owners with AI paint maintenance app"
excerpt: "A Dubai-based start-up has unveiled an AI-powered app that aims to disrupt the paint maintenance industry. The Digital Paint Report (DPR) app from SteelCorr uses artificial intelligence and cloud-based systems to help ship-owners around the world monitor their multi-million dollar assets remotely."
